nodes.text: An individual served as an aide to a member of the Galactic Senate sometime before the beginning of the Great Galactic War between the Galactic Republic and the Sith Empire. During the aide's career, the individual was the partner of the astromech droid T7-O1 for some amount of time.

The Senator's aide was first mentioned by T7-O1, a companion character for the Jedi Knight class in Star Wars: The Old Republic, a video game released by BioWare and LucasArts in 2011. In the conversation "Master Zallow," T7-O1 names the aide as one of his twelve previous partners, though he does not specify the individual's name, species, or gender.
